entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 22.
